assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Some of the authors are from the Department of Molecular and Human Genetics at Baylor College of Medicine, which offers extensive genetic laboratory testing, including use of arrays for genomic copy number analysis, and derives revenue from this activity.

assertion.label: Free to read
assertion.name: free
assertion.value: This content has been made available to all.

publisher: Springer Science and Business Media LLC
